sentences.en: He delivered one of his longest and most important speeches at Pueblo, Colorado, on September 25.
sentences.cn: 9月25日,他在科罗拉多的普韦布洛发表他最长而且最重要的演说之一.

sentences.en: In 2003, the city of Pueblo , Colorado passed a law making public places and workplaces smoke - free.
sentences.cn: 2003年科罗拉多州的普韦布洛城通过公共场所和工作场所禁烟的法令.

sentences.en: There are several dozen Indian pueblos near Santa Fe.
sentences.cn: 圣达菲附近有几十个印第安人村庄。

trans.tran_en: A pueblo is a village, especially in the southwestern United States
